mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( reg_id, nick_name, div, title, contents, ask_cnt, read_cnt, reg_dt, mod_dt ) SELECT DECODE(MOD(ROWNUM, 2), 1, '10', '20'), '닉네임'|| LPAD(ROWNUM, 7, '0'), DECODE(MOD(ROWNUM, 3), 0, '10', 1, '20', '30'), '제목' || LPAD(ROWNUM, 7, '0'), '내용' || LPAD(ROWNUM, 7, '0'), MOD(ROWNUM, 10), 0, SYSDATE - ROWNUM / 24, SYSDATE - ROWNUM / 24 + 1 FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 101
mapper.update: UPDATE C##NUMBERONE.BOARD SET reg_id = #{regId}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, read_cnt = #{readCnt}, MOD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO as boardNo, div, REG_ID as regId, TITLE as title, CONTENTS as contents, ask_cnt as askCnt, READ_CNT as readCnt, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as regDt, TO_CHAR(MOD_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as modDt, NICK_NAME as nickName FROM C##NUMBERONE.BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO C##NUMBERONE.BOARD ( REG_ID, div, TITLE, CONTENTS, ASK_CNT, READ_CNT, REG_DT, MOD_DT, NICK_NAME ) VALUES ( #{regId}, #{div}, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, 0, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{nickName} )
